data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 4,349 believers in Shida Kartli that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Shida Kartli, Georgia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 320,700 people living in Shida Kartli, Georgia. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 73 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Shida Kartli, Georgia to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Shida Kartli, Georgia and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Turk people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Turk people know you.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Shida Kartli, Georgia to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Shida Kartli, Georgia to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Shida Kartli, Georgia that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

location.name: Shida Kartli
location.people_groups_list: Estonian, Kurd, Kurmanji, Yazidi, Kist, Kazakh
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Estonian (1,600), Kurd, Kurmanji (1,700), Yazidi (12,000), Kist (5,400), Kazakh (1,800)
